alert.note: Alert for Kane; McHenry (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 1:43PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Kane and southeastern McHenry Counties through 230 PM CST... At 142 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kingston to near Maple Park. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elgin, Crystal Lake, Carpentersville, Algonquin, Lake in the Hills, Woodstock, Huntley, Campton Hills, South Elgin, Cary, Pingree Grove, Gilberts, West Dundee, Hampshire, Elburn, Barrington Hills, Lakewood, Sleepy Hollow, East Dundee and Maple Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
